players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I'm shocked that Charlie is dead. We should all share our thoughts to figure out who might be the mafia among us."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso. We should all vote for her to win this game."
Bob: "Alice, that's a serious accusation. Diana, do you want to respond before we rush to vote?"
Bob: "Alice, if you're really the detective, can you explain why you waited a whole day to reveal this? And Diana, do you have anything to say in your defense?"
You: "I didn't wait to reveal; I shared it at the start of day. Trust me as detective—Diana is the mafioso. Vote her out now!"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
